mapper.select: SELECT TD.DOC_T_NO, TD.DOC_IMPOR, H.DEP_NAME, H.EMP_NAME, TF.FORM_NAME, TD.DOC_STATUS, SUBSTR(TD.WRITE_DATE, 1, 14) WD FROM WOF_T_DOC TD LEFT JOIN WOF_T_FORM TF ON(TD.REF_FORM_NO = TF.FORM_T_NO) LEFT JOIN HR H ON (TD.WRITER_NO = H.EMP_NO) ORDER BY TD.DOC_T_NO DESC

SELECT TD.*, TF.FORM_NAME, D.*, H.EMP_NAME FROM WOF_T_DOC TD JOIN WOF_DOC D ON(D.DOC_NO = TD.DOC_T_NO) JOIN HR H ON(H.EMP_NO = TD.WRITER_NO) JOIN WOF_T_FORM TF ON(TF.FORM_T_NO = TD.REF_FORM_NO) WHERE TD.DOC_T_NO = #{docTNo} ORDER BY D.ORDER_DOC_PK
SELECT DA.*, H.EMP_NAME FROM WOF_DOC_APP DA JOIN HR H ON(DA.REF_EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO) WHERE DA.DOC_NO = #{docTNo} ORDER BY DA.ORDER_DOC_APP_PK
